   SOURCE DB2 SSID: DB2P                         DATE/TIME: 07-06-09, 08:48:56:5
   TARGET DB2 SSID: DB2P                         SQL CODE :   +0                
        STMT      : 5795         (1)             MESSAGE  :                     
        COLLECTION: MAPCCOLE                                                    
        PACKAGE   : NM100D1

  SQL STATEMENT TEXT:                                                           
                                                                                
  DECLARE EZE010001NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
1 2009/06/07  08:50                                                  PAGE      4
                                                                                
  ------------------------------------------------------------- USER ID: JONAS  
                                                                                
  SELECT  TPPRM , CDPRM , TPPRMCND , NRSEQPRM , NRSEQANE , CDANE , DTINIVIG ,   
          DTLIMENQ , NRSEQAPR , TPSIT , NRSEQTAB                                
     FROM DB2USER.CNDGERENQANE T1                                               
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-17-H.EZEI-371 :EZESQL-EZER-17-I.EZEI-371 AND  
          T1.CDPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-17-H.EZEI-370 :EZESQL-EZER-17-I.EZEI-370 AND  
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQL-EZER-17-H.EZEI-369 :EZESQL-EZER-17-I.EZEI-369   
          AND T1.NRSEQPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-17-H.EZEI-368                          
          :EZESQL-EZER-17-I.EZEI-368 AND T1.DTLIMENQ >=                         
          :EZESQL-EZER-17-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-17-I.EZEI-365 AND T1.DTINIVIG 
          = (                                                                   
  SELECT  MAX ( B.DTINIVIG )                                                    
     FROM DB2USER.CNDGERENQANE B                                                
    WHERE B.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND B.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND B.TPPRMCND = T1.TPPRMCND
          AND B.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND B.DTINIVIG <=                        
          :EZESQL-EZER-17-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-17-I.EZEI-365 AND B.DTLIMENQ  
          >= :EZESQL-EZER-17-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-17-I.EZEI-365 AND B.TPSIT =
          2 ) AND T1.TPSIT = 2                                                  
    ORDER BY NRSEQANE , CDANE WITH UR

  SQL DESIGN RULE: 0071   ------------------------   SEVERITY CODE = 0          
  THIS SQL USES THE MAX COLUMN FUNCTION ON THE COLUMN DTINIVIG OF THE           
  TABLE DB2USER.CNDGERENQANE.                                                   
                                                                                
  RECOMMENDATION: 0076                                                          
  PLACE A DESCENDING INDEX ON THIS COLUMN TO ALLOW DB2 TO OBTAIN THE            
  MAXIMUM VALUE VIA A FETCH INDEX SCAN. A FETCH INDEX SCAN WILL JUST READ       
  THE FIRST PAGE OF THE INDEX TO OBTAIN THE MAXIMUM VALUE FOR THIS COLUMN.

  DECLARE EZE004001NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  TPPRM , CDPRM , TPPRMCND , NRSEQPRM , DTINIVIG , DTLIMENQ , CDCLS ,   
          TPSIT , NRSEQTAB                                                      
     FROM DB2USER.CNDGERENQCLS T1                                               
1 2009/06/07  08:50                                                  PAGE      9
                                                                                
  ------------------------------------------------------------- USER ID: JONAS  
                                                                                
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-8-H.EZEI-371 :EZESQL-EZER-8-I.EZEI-371 AND    
          T1.CDPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-8-H.EZEI-370 :EZESQL-EZER-8-I.EZEI-370 AND    
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQL-EZER-8-H.EZEI-369 :EZESQL-EZER-8-I.EZEI-369 AND 
          T1.NRSEQPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-8-H.EZEI-368 :EZESQL-EZER-8-I.EZEI-368 AND 
          T1.TPSIT = 2 AND T1.DTINIVIG = (                                      
  SELECT  MAX ( T2.DTINIVIG )                                                   
     FROM DB2USER.CNDGERENQCLS T2                                               
    WHERE T2.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T2.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T2.TPPRMCND =         
          T1.TPPRMCND AND T2.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T2.TPSIT = T1.TPSIT AND 
          T2.DTINIVIG <= :EZESQL-EZER-8-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-8-I.EZEI-365 AND
          T2.DTLIMENQ >= :EZESQL-EZER-8-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-8-I.EZEI-365 )  
          WITH UR

  SQL DESIGN RULE: 0071   ------------------------   SEVERITY CODE = 0          
  THIS SQL USES THE MAX COLUMN FUNCTION ON THE COLUMN DTINIVIG OF THE           
  TABLE DB2USER.CNDGERENQCLS.                                                   
                                                                                
  RECOMMENDATION: 0076                                                          
  PLACE A DESCENDING INDEX ON THIS COLUMN TO ALLOW DB2 TO OBTAIN THE            
  MAXIMUM VALUE VIA A FETCH INDEX SCAN. A FETCH INDEX SCAN WILL JUST READ       
  THE FIRST PAGE OF THE INDEX TO OBTAIN THE MAXIMUM VALUE FOR THIS COLUMN.      
                                                                                
  SQL DESIGN RULE: 0073   ------------------------   SEVERITY CODE = 0          
  THIS SQL STATEMENT ACCESSES THE FOLLOWING TABLE(S) AND INDEXES. THESE         
  ACCESSES ARE NOT MATCHING ALL COLUMNS IN THE INDEX(ES).                       
                                                                                
  TABLE : TECINFOR.CNDGERENQCLS                                                 
  INDEX : TECINFOR.CNDGERENQCLS_PK                                              
  # MATCHED COLUMNS:    4 OF    5                                               
                                                                                
  RECOMMENDATION: 0116                                                          
  CONSIDER INCLUDING PREDICATES INVOLVING ALL OF THE INDEXED COLUMNS TO         
  ALLOW FULL MATCHING INDEX ACCESS TO THIS TABLE'S DATA.                        
                                                                                
  SQL DESIGN RULE: 0078   ------------------------   SEVERITY CODE = 0          
  THIS SQL STATEMENT CONTAINS QUALIFIED TABLE NAMES. SOME OR ALL OF THE         
  TABLE NAMES ARE QUALIFIED, HOWEVER ALL THE TABLE NAMES APPEAR FULLY           
  QUALIFIED DUE TO ENHANCED EXPLAIN PROCESSING. PLEASE REFER TO THE ACTUAL      
  SQL SOURCE TO DETERMINE WHICH TABLES HAVE QUALIFIED NAMES.                    
                                                                                
  RECOMMENDATION: 0121                                                          
1 2009/06/07  08:50                                                  PAGE     13
                                                                                
  ------------------------------------------------------------- USER ID: JONAS  
                                                                                
  IF POSSIBLE, CONSIDER REWRITING THE SQL ELIMINATING QUALIFIED TABLE

  THIS SQL STATEMENT CONTAINS AN UNQUALIFIED FUNCTION ON THE COLUMN DTINIVIG    
  OF THE TABLE DB2USER.CNDGERENQCLS.                                            
                                                                                
  RECOMMENDATION: 0133                                                          
  CONSIDER QUALIFYING THE FUNCTION TO AVOID UNEXPECTED QUALIFICATION.           
                                                                                
  SQL DESIGN RULE: 0089   ------------------------   SEVERITY CODE = 0          
  THIS SQL IS NOT UTILIZING PARALLEL I/O PROCESSING. PARALLEL I/O CAN

   TARGET DB2 SSID: DB2P                         SQL CODE :   +0

  SQL STATEMENT TEXT:                                                           
                                                                                
  DECLARE EZE006001NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  T1.TPPRM , T1.CDPRM , T1.TPPRMCND , T1.NRSEQPRM , T1.DTINIVIG ,       
          T1.DTLIMENQ , T1.CDFLA , T1.TPSIT , T1.NRSEQTAB                       
     FROM DB2USER.CNDGERENQFILA T1                                              
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-6-H.EZEI-371 :EZESQL-EZER-6-I.EZEI-371 AND    
          T1.CDPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-6-H.EZEI-370 :EZESQL-EZER-6-I.EZEI-370 AND    
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQL-EZER-6-H.EZEI-369 :EZESQL-EZER-6-I.EZEI-369 AND 
          T1.NRSEQPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-6-H.EZEI-368 :EZESQL-EZER-6-I.EZEI-368 AND 
          T1.DTINIVIG = (                                                       
  SELECT  MAX ( T2.DTINIVIG )                                                   
     FROM DB2USER.CNDGERENQFILA T2                                              
    WHERE T2.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T2.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T2.TPPRMCND =         
          T1.TPPRMCND AND T2.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T2.DTINIVIG <=          
          :EZESQL-EZER-6-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-6-I.EZEI-365 AND T2.DTLIMENQ >=
          :EZESQL-EZER-6-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-6-I.EZEI-365 AND T2.TPSIT = 2 )
          AND T1.TPSIT = 2 WITH UR

  DECLARE EZE007001NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  T1.TPPRM , T1.CDPRM , T1.TPPRMCND , T1.NRSEQPRM , T1.DTINIVIG ,       
          T1.DTLIMENQ , T1.TPPRREMI , T1.TPSIT , T1.NRSEQTAB                    
     FROM DB2USER.CNDGERENQPRR T1                                               
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-5-H.EZEI-371 :EZESQL-EZER-5-I.EZEI-371 AND    
          T1.CDPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-5-H.EZEI-370 :EZESQL-EZER-5-I.EZEI-370 AND    
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQL-EZER-5-H.EZEI-369 :EZESQL-EZER-5-I.EZEI-369 AND 
          T1.NRSEQPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-5-H.EZEI-368 :EZESQL-EZER-5-I.EZEI-368 AND 
          T1.DTINIVIG = (                                                       
  SELECT  MAX ( T2.DTINIVIG )                                                   
     FROM DB2USER.CNDGERENQPRR T2                                               
    WHERE T2.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T2.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T2.TPPRMCND =         
          T1.TPPRMCND AND T2.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T2.DTINIVIG <=          
          :EZESQL-EZER-5-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-5-I.EZEI-365 AND T2.DTLIMENQ >=
          :EZESQL-EZER-5-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-5-I.EZEI-365 AND T2.TPSIT = 2 )
          AND T1.TPSIT = 2 WITH UR

  SELECT  T1.CDREGPNE , MAX ( T4.DTINIVIG )                                     
     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL T4                  
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-372 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-372 AND  
          T1.CDPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-373 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-373 AND  
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-374 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-374   
          AND T1.NRSEQPRM > 0 AND T1.CDCATAUT = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-379      
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-379 AND T1.CDCEPPNEINI <=                      
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-388 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-388 AND             
1 2009/06/07  08:50                                                  PAGE     26
                                                                                
  ------------------------------------------------------------- USER ID: JONAS  
                                                                                
          T1.CDCEPPNEFNL >= :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-389                          
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-389 AND T4.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T4.CDPRM =     
          T1.CDPRM AND T4.TPPRMCND = T1.TPPRMCND AND T4.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM  
          AND T4.DTINIVIG <= :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-1 AND    
          T4.DTLIMENQ >= :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-2 AND        
          T4.TPSIT = 2                                                          
    GROUP BY T1.CDREGPNE                                                        
    ORDER BY 2 DESC WITH UR

  SQL STATEMENT TEXT:                                                           
                                                                                
  DECLARE EZE001002NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  T1.NRSEQPRM , MAX ( T4.DTINIVIG )                                     
     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ3 T3 ,             
          DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL T4                                               
1 2009/06/07  08:50                                                  PAGE     32
                                                                                
  ------------------------------------------------------------- USER ID: JONAS  
                                                                                
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = T3.TPPRM AND T1.CDPRM = T3.CDPRM AND T1.TPPRMCND =         
          T3.TPPRMCND AND T1.NRSEQPRM = T3.NRSEQPRM AND T1.TPPRM = T4.TPPRM AND 
          T1.CDPRM = T4.CDPRM AND T1.TPPRMCND = T4.TPPRMCND AND T1.NRSEQPRM =   
          T4.NRSEQPRM AND T3.TPPRM = T4.TPPRM AND T3.CDPRM = T4.CDPRM AND       
          T3.TPPRMCND = T4.TPPRMCND AND T3.NRSEQPRM = T4.NRSEQPRM AND T1.TPPRM =
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-372 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-372 AND T1.CDPRM =  
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-373 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-373 AND T1.TPPRMCND 
          = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-374 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-374 AND           
          T1.NRSEQPRM > 0 AND T1.CDREGTRF = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-383          
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-383 AND T1.CDREGPNE =                          
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-384 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-384 AND             
          T1.CDCEPTRFINI <= :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-386                          
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-386 AND T1.CDCEPTRFFNL >=                      
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-387 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-387 AND             
          T1.CDCEPPNEINI <= :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-388                          
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-388 AND T1.CDCEPPNEFNL >=                      
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-389 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-389 AND T1.CDCPNVEI 
          = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-395 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-395 AND           
          T3.CDCOBINI <= :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-2 AND         
          T3.CDCOBFNL >= :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-3 AND         
          T4.DTINIVIG <= :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-1 AND        
          T4.DTLIMENQ >= :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-2 AND        
          T4.TPSIT = 2                                                          
    GROUP BY T1.NRSEQPRM                                                        
    ORDER BY 2 DESC WITH UR                                                     
                                                                                
  ACCESS PATH ANALYSIS:                                                         
                                                                                
  THE ESTIMATED SQL COST COMPUTED AT EXPLAIN TIME IS ROUGHLY                    
  2 MILLISECONDS OR 27 SERVICE UNITS AND THE RELATIVE                           
  COST CALCULATED IN TIMERONS (CPU AND I/O UTILIZATION) IS +.51374 E+02.

   TARGET DB2 SSID: DB2P                         SQL CODE :   +0                
        STMT      : 5981         (8)             MESSAGE  :

        PACKAGE   : NM100D1

  SQL STATEMENT TEXT:                                                           
                                                                                
  DECLARE EZE001003NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  CDCEPPNEINI , CDCEPPNEFNL                                             
     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL T4                  
    WHERE T4.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T4.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T4.TPPRMCND =         
          T1.TPPRMCND AND T4.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T1.TPPRM =              
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-372 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-372 AND T1.CDPRM =  
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-373 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-373 AND T1.TPPRMCND 
          = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-374 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-374 AND           
          T1.NRSEQPRM > 0 AND T1.CDCATAUT = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-379          
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-379 AND T1.CDCEPPNEINI <=                      
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-388 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-388 AND             
          T1.CDCEPPNEFNL >= :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-389                          
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-389 AND T4.DTINIVIG <=                         
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-1 AND T4.DTLIMENQ >=        
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-2 AND T4.TPSIT = 2          
    ORDER BY T4.DTINIVIG DESC

   SOURCE DB2 SSID: DB2P                         DATE/TIME: 07-06-09, 08:48:59:0
   TARGET DB2 SSID: DB2P                         SQL CODE :   +0                
        STMT      : 6007         (9)             MESSAGE  :

  SQL STATEMENT TEXT:                                                           
                                                                                
  DECLARE EZE001004NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  T1.CDMRCVEI , MAX ( T2.DTINIVIG )                                     
     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.NAOACEITACOBVIG T2               
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-372 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-372 AND  
          T1.CDPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-373 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-373 AND  
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-374 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-374   
          AND T1.NRSEQPRM > 0 AND T1.CDMRCVEI = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-377      
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-377 AND T1.CDTIPVEI =                          
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-378 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-378 AND T2.CDCOB =  
          108 AND T2.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T2.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T2.TPPRMCND = 
          T1.TPPRMCND AND T2.DTINIVIG <=                                        
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-1 AND T2.DTLIMENQ >=        
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-2 AND T2.TPSIT = 2          
    GROUP BY T1.CDMRCVEI                                                        
    ORDER BY 2 DESC WITH UR

  DECLARE EZE001005NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  T1.NRSEQPRM , MAX ( T4.DTINIVIG )                                     
     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL T4                  
    WHERE T4.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T4.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T4.TPPRMCND =         
          T1.TPPRMCND AND T4.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T1.TPPRM =              
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-2 AND T1.CDPRM =             
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-4-0-0-1 AND T1.TPPRMCND =          
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-3 AND T1.CDMRCVEIRSM =       
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-4 AND T1.CDTIPVEIRSM =       
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-5 AND T1.CDCEPTARINI <=      
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-4-0-0-2 AND T1.CDCEPTARFNL >=      
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-4-0-0-3 AND T4.DTINIVIG <=         
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-1 AND T4.DTLIMENQ >=        
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-2 AND T4.TPSIT = 2          
    GROUP BY T1.NRSEQPRM                                                        
    ORDER BY 2 DESC WITH UR FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY                             
  OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROWS

  SQL DESIGN RULE: 0076   ------------------------   SEVERITY CODE = 0          
  THIS SQL STATEMENT CONTAINS THE OPTIMIZE FOR CLAUSE, HOWEVER THIS CLAUSE      
  IS BEING IGNORED BY THE OPTIMIZER. THIS OCCURS IN THE FOLLOWING               
  SITUATIONS.                                                                   
                                                                                
  1. THE QUERY CONTAINS THE DISTINCT KEYWORD.                                   
                                                                                
  2. A GROUP BY OR ORDER BY CLAUSE EXISTS AND THERE IS NO INDEX TO PROVIDE THE  
  NECESSARY ORDERING.                                                           
                                                                                
  3. A COLUMN FUNCTION EXISTS AND NO GROUP BY EXISTS.                           
                                                                                
  4. THE QUERY CONTAINS A UNION OR UNION ALL KEYWORD.                           
                                                                                
  RECOMMENDATION: 0119                                                          
  PPA R11.5 SP1 --------- PLAN ANALYZER ENHANCED EXPLAIN ------------- PAGE    6
  DATE 07-06-09            SQL STATEMENT DETAIL REPORTS                TIME 08:4
                                                                                
  CONSIDER REMOVING THE OPTIMIZE FOR CLAUSE FOR SQL STATEMENTS CONTAINING       
  KEYWORDS DISTINCT, UNION, OR UNION ALL. CONSIDER ADDING ON COLUMNS            
  SPECIFIED BY THE GROUP BY OR ORDER BY KEYWORD. IF A COLUMN FUNCTION IS        
  SPECIFIED CONSIDER ADDING A GROUP BY CLAUSE.

  DECLARE EZE001006NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  T1.NRSEQPRM , MAX ( T4.DTINIVIG )                                     
     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL T4                  
    WHERE T4.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T4.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T4.TPPRMCND =         
          T1.TPPRMCND AND T4.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T1.TPPRM =              
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-2 AND T1.CDPRM =             
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-4-0-0-1 AND T1.TPPRMCND =          
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-3 AND T1.CDMRCVEIRSM =       
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-4 AND T1.CDTIPVEIRSM =       
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-5 AND T1.CDSUBREG =          
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-6 AND T4.DTINIVIG <=         
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-1 AND T4.DTLIMENQ >=        
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-2 AND T4.TPSIT = 2          
    GROUP BY T1.NRSEQPRM                                                        
                                                                                
  ACCESS PATH ANALYSIS:                                                         
                                                                                
  THE ESTIMATED SQL COST COMPUTED AT EXPLAIN TIME IS ROUGHLY                    
  1 MILLISECONDS OR 6 SERVICE UNITS AND THE RELATIVE                            
  COST CALCULATED IN TIMERONS (CPU AND I/O UTILIZATION) IS +.34841 E+02.

  DECLARE EZE001007NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  CDCEPTARINI                                                           
     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL T4                  
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-372 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-372 AND  
          T1.CDPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-373 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-373 AND  
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-374 :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-374   
          AND T1.NRSEQPRM > 0 AND T1.CDREGTAR = :EZESQL-EZER-18-H.EZEI-413      
          :EZESQL-EZER-18-I.EZEI-413 AND T4.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T4.CDPRM =     
          T1.CDPRM AND T4.TPPRMCND = T1.TPPRMCND AND T4.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM  
          AND T4.DTINIVIG <= :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-1 AND    
          T4.DTLIMENQ >= :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-2 AND        
          T4.TPSIT = 2 WITH UR

  DECLARE EZE001008NM100D1 CURSOR FOR

     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL T4

     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ2 T2 ,             
          DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL T4

          T1.TPPRMCND AND T2.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T4.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND

  GROUP BY T1.NRSEQPRM                                                          
                                                                                
  REFERENCES THE FOLLOWING COLUMN(S) AND TABLE(S):

  TO AVOID SORTING TO SATISFY THIS QUERY.

  THIS SQL STATEMENT IS EXPLICITLY JOINING 3 TABLES IN THE FOLLOWING FROM CLAUSE
                                                                                
  FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ2 T2 , DB2USER.CNDGERE
  QVAL T4                                                                       
                                                                                
  YOUR INSTALLATION HAS SET A THRESHOLD OF 2 FOR THE NUMBER OF TABLES THAT MAY B
  EXPLICITLY JOINED TOGETHER IN A SINGLE SQL STATEMENT. EXCEEDING THIS LIMIT WIL
  CAUSE POOR PERFORMANCE.

  NECESSARY ORDERING.

  4. THE QUERY CONTAINS A UNION OR UNION ALL KEYWORD.

  KEYWORDS DISTINCT, UNION, OR UNION ALL. CONSIDER ADDING ON COLUMNS            
  SPECIFIED BY THE GROUP BY OR ORDER BY KEYWORD. IF A COLUMN FUNCTION IS        
  SPECIFIED CONSIDER ADDING A GROUP BY CLAUSE.

  THIS SQL STATEMENT CONTAINS THE OPTIMIZE FOR CLAUSE, HOWEVER THIS CLAUSE      
  IS BEING IGNORED BY THE OPTIMIZER. THIS OCCURS IN THE FOLLOWING               
  SITUATIONS.                                                                   
                                                                                
  1. THE QUERY CONTAINS THE DISTINCT KEYWORD.                                   
                                                                                
  2. A GROUP BY OR ORDER BY CLAUSE EXISTS AND THERE IS NO INDEX TO PROVIDE THE  
  NECESSARY ORDERING.                                                           
                                                                                
  3. A COLUMN FUNCTION EXISTS AND NO GROUP BY EXISTS.                           
                                                                                
  4. THE QUERY CONTAINS A UNION OR UNION ALL KEYWORD.                           
                                                                                
  RECOMMENDATION: 0119                                                          
  CONSIDER REMOVING THE OPTIMIZE FOR CLAUSE FOR SQL STATEMENTS CONTAINING       
  KEYWORDS DISTINCT, UNION, OR UNION ALL. CONSIDER ADDING ON COLUMNS            
  SPECIFIED BY THE GROUP BY OR ORDER BY KEYWORD. IF A COLUMN FUNCTION IS        
  SPECIFIED CONSIDER ADDING A GROUP BY CLAUSE.

  DECLARE EZE001013NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  T1.NRSEQPRM                                                           
     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ3 T3               
    WHERE T3.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T3.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T3.TPPRMCND =         
          T1.TPPRMCND AND T3.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T1.TPPRM =

  NAMES. THIS WILL IMPROVE PORTABILITY OF THE SQL.                              
                                                                                
  SQL DESIGN RULE: 0089   ------------------------   SEVERITY CODE = 0          
  THIS SQL IS NOT UTILIZING PARALLEL I/O PROCESSING. PARALLEL I/O CAN           
  SIGNIFICANTLY REDUCE RESPONSE TIME FOR SQL STATEMENTS.

  CONSIDER TAKING ADVANTAGE OF USING I/O PARALLELISM FOR THE SQL STATEMENT

  PPA R11.5 SP1 --------- PLAN ANALYZER ENHANCED EXPLAIN ------------- PAGE   16
  DATE 07-06-09            SQL STATEMENT DETAIL REPORTS                TIME 08:4
                                                                                
   SOURCE DB2 SSID: DB2P                         DATE/TIME: 07-06-09, 08:48:59:6
   TARGET DB2 SSID: DB2P                         SQL CODE :   +0                
        STMT      : 6748         (19)            MESSAGE  :                     
        COLLECTION: MAPCCOLE                                                    
        PACKAGE   : NM100D1                                                     
        VERSION   :                                                             
        HINT USED : N/A                                                         
                                                                                
  SQL STATEMENT TEXT:                                                           
                                                                                
  DECLARE EZE003001NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  T1.CDPRM , MAX ( T2.DTINIVIG )                                        
     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ2 T1 , DB2USER.CNDGERENQCLS T2                  
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-14-H.EZEI-248 :EZESQL-EZER-14-I.EZEI-248 AND  
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQL-EZER-14-H.EZEI-250 :EZESQL-EZER-14-I.EZEI-250   
          AND T1.CDSUC = :EZESQL-EZER-14-H.EZEI-261 :EZESQL-EZER-14-I.EZEI-261  
          AND T1.CDINP = :EZESQL-EZER-14-H.EZEI-264 :EZESQL-EZER-14-I.EZEI-264  
          AND T2.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T2.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T2.TPPRMCND =     
          T1.TPPRMCND AND T2.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T2.DTINIVIG <=          
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-1 AND T2.DTLIMENQ >=        
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-2 AND T2.TPSIT = 2          
    GROUP BY T1.CDPRM                                                           
    ORDER BY 2 DESC WITH UR

  DECLARE EZE003003NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  T1.NRSEQPRM , MAX ( T4.DTINIVIG )                                     
     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ2 T1 , DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ3 T2 ,             
          DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL T4                                               
    WHERE T2.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T2.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T2.TPPRMCND =         
          T1.TPPRMCND AND T2.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T4.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND 
1 2009/06/07  08:50                                                  PAGE    159
                                                                                
  ------------------------------------------------------------- USER ID: JONAS  
                                                                                
          T4.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T4.TPPRMCND = T1.TPPRMCND AND T4.NRSEQPRM =   
          T1.NRSEQPRM AND T1.TPPRM = :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-2 
          AND T1.CDPRM = :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-4-0-0-1 AND         
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-3 AND T1.CDCOB 
          = :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-BIN-2-0-0-4 AND T1.CDPLAOPC =

  MAXIMUM VALUE VIA A FETCH INDEX SCAN. A FETCH INDEX SCAN WILL JUST READ       
  THE FIRST PAGE OF THE INDEX TO OBTAIN THE MAXIMUM VALUE FOR THIS COLUMN.

  DATE 07-06-09            SQL STATEMENT DETAIL REPORTS                TIME 08:4
                                                                                
  THIS SQL STATEMENT CONTAINS THE OPTIMIZE FOR CLAUSE, HOWEVER THIS CLAUSE      
  IS BEING IGNORED BY THE OPTIMIZER. THIS OCCURS IN THE FOLLOWING               
  SITUATIONS.                                                                   
                                                                                
  1. THE QUERY CONTAINS THE DISTINCT KEYWORD.                                   
                                                                                
  2. A GROUP BY OR ORDER BY CLAUSE EXISTS AND THERE IS NO INDEX TO PROVIDE THE  
  NECESSARY ORDERING.                                                           
                                                                                
  3. A COLUMN FUNCTION EXISTS AND NO GROUP BY EXISTS.                           
                                                                                
  4. THE QUERY CONTAINS A UNION OR UNION ALL KEYWORD.

1 2009/06/07  08:50                                                  PAGE    173
                                                                                
  ------------------------------------------------------------- USER ID: JONAS  
                                                                                
  KEYWORDS DISTINCT, UNION, OR UNION ALL. CONSIDER ADDING ON COLUMNS            
  SPECIFIED BY THE GROUP BY OR ORDER BY KEYWORD. IF A COLUMN FUNCTION IS        
  SPECIFIED CONSIDER ADDING A GROUP BY CLAUSE.                                  
                                                                                
  SQL DESIGN RULE: 0078   ------------------------   SEVERITY CODE = 0          
  THIS SQL STATEMENT CONTAINS QUALIFIED TABLE NAMES. SOME OR ALL OF THE

  SQL DESIGN RULE: 0076   ------------------------   SEVERITY CODE = 0          
  THIS SQL STATEMENT CONTAINS THE OPTIMIZE FOR CLAUSE, HOWEVER THIS CLAUSE      
  IS BEING IGNORED BY THE OPTIMIZER. THIS OCCURS IN THE FOLLOWING               
  SITUATIONS.                                                                   
                                                                                
  1. THE QUERY CONTAINS THE DISTINCT KEYWORD.                                   
                                                                                
  2. A GROUP BY OR ORDER BY CLAUSE EXISTS AND THERE IS NO INDEX TO PROVIDE THE  
  NECESSARY ORDERING.                                                           
                                                                                
  3. A COLUMN FUNCTION EXISTS AND NO GROUP BY EXISTS.                           
                                                                                
  4. THE QUERY CONTAINS A UNION OR UNION ALL KEYWORD.                           
                                                                                
  RECOMMENDATION: 0119                                                          
  CONSIDER REMOVING THE OPTIMIZE FOR CLAUSE FOR SQL STATEMENTS CONTAINING       
  KEYWORDS DISTINCT, UNION, OR UNION ALL. CONSIDER ADDING ON COLUMNS            
  SPECIFIED BY THE GROUP BY OR ORDER BY KEYWORD. IF A COLUMN FUNCTION IS        
  SPECIFIED CONSIDER ADDING A GROUP BY CLAUSE.

  PPA R11.5 SP1 --------- PLAN ANALYZER ENHANCED EXPLAIN ------------- PAGE   26
  DATE 07-06-09            SQL STATEMENT DETAIL REPORTS                TIME 08:4
                                                                                
   SOURCE DB2 SSID: DB2P                         DATE/TIME: 07-06-09, 08:49:00:3
   TARGET DB2 SSID: DB2P                         SQL CODE :   +0                
        STMT      : 7636         (28)            MESSAGE  :                     
        COLLECTION: MAPCCOLE                                                    
        PACKAGE   : NM100D1                                                     
        VERSION   :                                                             
        HINT USED : N/A                                                         
                                                                                
  SQL STATEMENT TEXT:                                                           
                                                                                
  DECLARE EZE002002NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  T1.CDREGPNE , T4.VLCFCDESAGV , MAX ( T4.DTINIVIG )                    
     FROM DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ1 T1 , DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ2 T2 ,             
          DB2USER.CONDICAOGERENQ3 T3 , DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL T4                  
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-9-H.EZEI-371 :EZESQL-EZER-9-I.EZEI-371 AND    
          T1.CDPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-9-H.EZEI-370 :EZESQL-EZER-9-I.EZEI-370 AND    
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQL-EZER-9-H.EZEI-369 :EZESQL-EZER-9-I.EZEI-369 AND 
          T1.NRSEQPRM > 0 AND T1.CDCATAUT = :EZESQL-EZER-9-H.EZEI-214           
          :EZESQL-EZER-9-I.EZEI-214 AND T1.CDCEPPNEINI <=                       
          :EZESQL-EZER-9-H.EZEI-205 :EZESQL-EZER-9-I.EZEI-205 AND T1.CDCEPPNEFNL
          >= :EZESQL-EZER-9-H.EZEI-204 :EZESQL-EZER-9-I.EZEI-204 AND T2.TPPRM = 
          T1.TPPRM AND T2.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T2.TPPRMCND = T1.TPPRMCND AND    
          T2.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T3.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T3.CDPRM =      
          T1.CDPRM AND T3.TPPRMCND = T1.TPPRMCND AND T3.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM  
          AND T4.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND T4.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND T4.TPPRMCND =     
          T1.TPPRMCND AND T4.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND T4.DTINIVIG <=          
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-1 AND T4.DTLIMENQ >=        
          :EZESQLTMP-VARIABLES.EZESQLTMP-CHA-10-0-0-2 AND T4.TPSIT = 2          
    GROUP BY T1.CDREGPNE , T4.VLCFCDESAGV                                       
    ORDER BY 3 DESC WITH UR

  SQL STATEMENT TEXT:                                                           
                                                                                
  DECLARE EZE009001NM100D1 CURSOR FOR                                           
  SELECT  T1.TPPRM , T1.CDPRM , T1.TPENQPRM , T1.TPPRMCND , T1.NRSEQTAB         
     FROM DB2USER.PARAMETROGERSEQ T1                                            
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-16-H.EZEI-371 :EZESQL-EZER-16-I.EZEI-371 AND  
          T1.CDPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-16-H.EZEI-370 :EZESQL-EZER-16-I.EZEI-370 AND  
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQL-EZER-16-H.EZEI-369 :EZESQL-EZER-16-I.EZEI-369   
          WITH UR                                                               
                                                                                
  ACCESS PATH ANALYSIS:                                                         
                                                                                
  THE ESTIMATED SQL COST COMPUTED AT EXPLAIN TIME IS ROUGHLY                    
  1 MILLISECONDS OR 1 SERVICE UNITS AND THE RELATIVE                            
  COST CALCULATED IN TIMERONS (CPU AND I/O UTILIZATION) IS +.93445 E-01.        
                                                                                
  THIS ACCESS PATH CONSISTS OF 1 QUERY BLOCK(S).                                
                   QUERY BLOCK 1 HAS 1 STEP(S).                                 
                                                                                
                                                                                
  +--- QUERY BLOCK: 1                                                           
  I

  SELECT  TPPRM , CDPRM , TPPRMCND , NRSEQPRM , DTINIVIG , DTLIMENQ , TPCALPRE ,
          VLCFCDESAGV , TPSIT , NRSEQTAB                                        
     INTO :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-371 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-371 ,               
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-370 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-370 ,               
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-369 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-369 ,               
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-368 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-368 ,               
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-365 ,               
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-364 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-364 ,               
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-221 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-221 ,               
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-220 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-220 ,               
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-362 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-362 ,               
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-361 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-361                 
     FROM DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL T1                                               
    WHERE T1.TPPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-371 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-371 AND  
          T1.CDPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-370 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-370 AND  
          T1.TPPRMCND = :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-369 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-369   
          AND T1.NRSEQPRM = :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-368                          
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-368 AND T1.DTLIMENQ >=                         
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-365 AND T1.DTINIVIG 
          = (                                                                   
  SELECT  MAX ( B.DTINIVIG )                                                    
     FROM DB2USER.CNDGERENQVAL B                                                
    WHERE B.TPPRM = T1.TPPRM AND B.CDPRM = T1.CDPRM AND B.TPPRMCND = T1.TPPRMCND
          AND B.NRSEQPRM = T1.NRSEQPRM AND B.DTINIVIG <=                        
          :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-365 AND B.DTLIMENQ  
          >= :EZESQL-EZER-11-H.EZEI-365 :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-365 AND B.TPSIT =
          2 ) AND T1.TPSIT = 2 WITH UR

        :EZESQL-EZER-11-I.EZEI-365 AND B . TPSIT = 2 )                          
                                                                                
     SUBSELECT #001                                                             
   ---> B . TPPRM = T1 . TPPRM                                YES   YES  0.25000
                                                                                
   ---> B . CDPRM = T1 . CDPRM                                YES   YES  0.00526
